page.title: 03A week's events in Drumaroad
page.content: On Wednesday 15th May 1985,our school was{polling station}for local council {elections.}New electoral boundaries had been drawn and our parents went to vote with people from Magheratimpanny, Drumnaquoile and Drumanaghan.The pole was open from 7 a.m. till 10 p.m. with voters for the first time producing proof of identity e.g. current driving licence,passport,allowance book or medical card.Some were not happy about this and the wet day didn't help! The following day,Ascension Thursday, was{First Communion}day for 7year olds in the Roman Catholic church,St. John the Baptist,Drumaroad. Whole families attended 9.30 a.m. Mass and went to a party afterwards in the school dining hall. Friday,17th,brought a{Concert}at 9p.m. in Drumaroad Community Centre, with folk-singing.On Sunday some saw Donegal beat Down at{Gaelic football.}
